page.title: 18LEISURE TIME IN ALSAGER
page.content: There were 112 juniors in our school on the day of our survey. We asked everybody two questions. The first one was "Which activity do you like best?" and the second was "Which activity do you spend most time doing?" The most popular activities were sport and watching television. The most unpopular activities were gardening and jobs. ACTIVITY Q.1 Q.2 Playing 5 17 Watching T.V. 27 49 Computer 8 4 Sport 41 9 Riding bike 5 7 Reading 6 6 Brownies, Cubs etc. 4 2 Church, Sunday School 1 0 Music 5 10 Visiting, Trips 10 1 Gardening, Jobs 0 7
